confirm_email.title: Successful registration
confirm_email.text2: Please take a second to confirm your email address:
confirm_email.text3: If the button above does not work, simply copy the link below and paste it into your browser:
confirm_email.text4_1: If you cannot verify your email address, just send us an email to
confirm_email.text4_2: , and we will be happy to help.
confirm_email.text6: If you still have questions, please send us an email at
confirm_email.text7: Our customer support team will help you from Monday to Friday from 7:00 to 16:00 (GMT)
